Grade: 95

Comment: This response provides a solid explanation of how the references to Jesus as "King of the Jews" in the Bible align with Old Testament prophecies. The student effectively connects specific prophecies from Isaiah, 2 Samuel, and Zechariah with the title given to Jesus in the New Testament. The explanation is clear, well-supported, and aligns well with Christian beliefs about Jesus as the fulfillment of Old Testament promises. Great job!
